thread.title: The Other Havana Club Puts on a Play to Try to Sell More Rum

author: Imani Moise
title: The Other Havana Club Puts on a Play to Try to Sell More Rum
text:
Bacardi Ltd.’s Havana Club rum is turning to immersive theater to win over hearts and taste buds.
In its battle for recognition as an authentic Cuban rum, the brand is staging a play, “Amparo,” in a Midtown Manhattan bar, following a debut in Miami last month.
The brand recruited a Cuban-American playwright and actors to convince audiences... To Read the Full Story Subscribe Sign In
